code: import React,{useState}from'react';import SubNav from'../../components/common/layout/SubNav';import FinanceDashboard from'./components/FinanceDashboard';import ProfitLoss from'./components/pl/ProfitLoss';import BalanceSheet from'./components/BalanceSheet';import CashFlow from'./components/cashflow/CashFlow';import Budget from'./components/budget/Budget';import Forecast from'./components/forecast/Forecast';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Finance=()=>{const[activeSubTab,setActiveSubTab]=useState('dashboard');const subTabs=[{id:'dashboard',name:'Dashboard'},{id:'pnl',name:'P&L'},{id:'balancesheet',name:'Balance Sheet'},{id:'cashflow',name:'Cash Flow'},{id:'budget',name:'Budget'},{id:'forecast',name:'Forecast'}];const renderContent=()=>{switch(activeSubTab){case'dashboard':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FinanceDashboard,{});case'pnl':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProfitLoss,{});case'balancesheet':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BalanceSheet,{});case'cashflow':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CashFlow,{});case'budget':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Budget,{});case'forecast':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Forecast,{});default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FinanceDashboard,{});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mb-8",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900",children:"Finance"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SubNav,{subTabs:subTabs,activeSubTab:activeSubTab,onSubTabChange:setActiveSubTab}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mt-8",children:renderContent()})]});};export default Finance;
